// LanguageContext.js
import React, { createContext, useContext, useState } from 'react';

const translations = {
    en: {
      "title": "HOSPITAL INFORMATION",
      "Home": "Home",
      "Services": "Services",
      "Hospitals": "Hospitals",
      "About": "About",
      "Contact": "Contact",
      "heroTitle": "Hospital Information: Medical Services and Hospital Location",
      "text": "Welcome to our medical devices identifier and location provider!",
      "btnClass": "show",
      "buttonText": "Hospitals",
      "BOOK": "Book",
      "List of Hospitals": "List of Hospitals",
      "Find Your nearest service": "Find Your nearest service",
      "Conditions": "Conditions",
      "Listings": "Listings",
      "What we offer": "What we offer",
      "How it Works": "How it Works",
      "Latest News": "Latest News",
      "Useful Links": "Useful Links",
      "Follow us": "Follow us",
      "Health Services": "Health Services",
      "Search by location, by service or by hospital": "Search by location, by service or by hospital",
      "Our top Services": "Our top Services",
      "These are the some hospitals in Addis Ababa": "These are some hospitals in Addis Ababa",
      "Location": "Location",
      "Dental": "Dental",
      "Maternity": "Maternity",
      "Mental Health": "Mental Health",
      "Emergency": "Emergency",
      "All Hospital": "All Hospital",
      "All services": "All services",
      "Menelik Hospital": "Menelik Hospital",
      "Yekatit 12 Hospital": "Yekatit 12 Hospital",
      "St.Paul's Hospital": "St.Paul's Hospital",
      "About Us": "About Us",
      "Welcome to our medical devices identifier and location provider! We are a team of dedicated professionals committed to improving the healthcare industry through innovative technology.": "Welcome to our medical devices identifier and location provider! We are a team of dedicated professionals committed to improving the healthcare industry through innovative technology.",
      "Get to know Us": "Get to know Us",
      "Our Vision, Values and purpose guide our work": "Our Vision, Values and purpose guide our work",
      "Who we are": "Who we are",
      "Learn about team.": "Learn about team.",
      "Which hospital is your feedback about?": "Which hospital is your feedback about?",
      "Select a hospital": "Select a hospital",
      "Provide detailed feedback for us": "Provide detailed feedback for us",
      "Submit": "Submit",
      "Login to Your Account": "Login to Your Account",
      "Username:": "Username:",
      "Password:": "Password:",
      "forget password?": "forget password?",
      "Login": "Login",
      "Register now": "Register now",
      "Email:": "Email:",
      "Confirm Password:": "Confirm Password:",
      "Register": "Register",
      "name" : "name",
       "First Name" :"First Name",
       "Book Appointment": "Book Appointment",
    },
    am: {
      "title": "ሆስፒታል መረጃ",
      "Home": "መነሻ",
      "Services": "አገልግሎት",
      "Hospitals": "ሆስፒታሎች",
      "About": "ስለ",
      "Contact": "እናገኛለን",
      "heroTitle": "ሆስፒታል መረጃ: የሕክምና አገልግሎቶች እና የሆስፒታል መገኛ ቦታ",
      "text": "እንኳን ወደ የሕክምና መሳሪያዎች መለያ እና መገኛ ቦታ ሰጪ በደህና መጡ!",
      "btnClass": "show",
      "buttonText": "ሆስፒታሎች",
      "BOOK": "ተመዝግበው",
      "List of Hospitals": "የሆስፒታሎች ዝርዝር",
      "Find Your nearest service": "ቅርብ ያሉትን አገልግሎቶች ይፈልጉ",
      "Conditions": "ሁኔታዎች",
      "Listings": "ዝርዝሮች",
      "What we offer": "ያቀርባል",
      "How it Works": "እንዴት እንደሚሰራ",
      "Latest News": "ወቅታዊ ዜና",
      "Useful Links": "ጠቃሚ አገናኞች",
      "Follow us": "አካቶን ይከተሉን",
      "Health Services": "የጤና አገልግሎቶች",
      "Search by location, by service or by hospital": "በቦታ, በአገልግሎት ወይም በሆስፒታል መሰረት ይፈልጉ",
      "Our top Services": "እኛ የከፍተኛ አገልግሎቶች",
      "These are the some hospitals in Addis Ababa": "እነዚህ በአዲስ አበባ ያሉ አንዳንድ ሆስፒታሎች ናቸው",
      "Location": "መገኛ ቦታ",
      "Dental": "የጥርስ አገልግሎት",
      "Maternity": "የወሊድ አገልግሎት",
      "Mental Health": "የአእምሮ ጤና",
      "Emergency": "አደጋ",
      "All Hospital": "ሁሉም ሆስፒታሎች",
      "All services": "ሁሉንም አገልግሎቶች",
      "Menelik Hospital": "መንሊክ ሆስፒታል",
      "Yekatit 12 Hospital": "የካቲት 12 ሆስፒታል",
      "St.Paul's Hospital": "ሴንት ፖል ሆስፒታል",
      "About Us": "ስለ እኛ",
      "Welcome to our medical devices identifier and location provider! We are a team of dedicated professionals committed to improving the healthcare industry through innovative technology.": "እንኳን ወደ የሕክምና መሳሪያዎች መለያ እና መገኛ ቦታ ሰጪ በደህና መጡ! እኛ በጤና ዘርፍ መሃንደሳዊ ቴክኖሎጂ ያለ ውጤት ማሻሻያ እንታመን የተዋል አባላት ነን።",
      "Get to know Us": "እኛን ይውሰዱ",
      "Our Vision, Values and purpose guide our work": "እኛ እንዴት እንደምን አርገዋለን",
      "Who we are": "እኛ እንዴት እንደምን አርገዋለን",
      "Learn about team.": "በቡድኑ ስለ ማሰብ",
      "Which hospital is your feedback about?": "የእኛን ሆስፒታል እንዴት እንደሚሰጥ",
      "Select a hospital": "ሆስፒታል ይምረጡ",
      "Provide detailed feedback for us": "ለእኛ ዝርዝር አስተያየት ይስጡ",
      "Submit": "አቅርብ",
      "Login to Your Account": "ወደ እትም መለያ ግባ",
      "Username:": "የተጠቃሚ ስም:",
      "Password:": "የሚስጥር ቃል:",
      "forget password?": "የሚስጥር ቃል ረሱ?",
      "Login": "ግባ",
      "Register now": "አሁን ይመዝገቡ",
      "Email:": "ኢሜይል:",
      "Confirm Password:": "የሚስጥር ቃልን ያረጋግጡ:",
      "Register": "ይመዝገቡ",
      "name" : "ስም",
      "First Name" :"የራህ ስም",
      "Book Appointment": "ቀጠሮ መያዝ",

const LanguageContext = createContext();

export const LanguageProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const [language, setLanguage] = useState('en');

  const switchLanguage = (selectedLanguage) => {
    setLanguage(selectedLanguage);
  };

  const translate = key => translations[language][key] || key;

  return (
    <LanguageContext.Provider value={{ language, switchLanguage, translate }}>
      {children}
    </LanguageContext.Provider>
  );
};

export const useLanguage = () => useContext(LanguageContext);
